name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Promptify - Personal Prompt Engineer and Manager

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Improve your ChatGPT prompts in a single click. Store custom prompts and paste them in a single click.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Welcome to Promptify,

Your personal Prompt Engineer for ChatGPT. 

Write a prompt, click on the assist button and make the prompts better using the proven ReAct framework for the best results

You can even easily store custom prompts in the popup page which can be pasted into ChatGPT in a single click.

This is the beta version, many more features are coming soon - Promptify is the only ChatGPT extension you need
